modules.description: Provides functions for capturing images and videos using device cameras, including methods to retrieve captured media as file paths or base64 strings. Works with data types such as file paths, binary data, and media metadata. Used to integrate camera functionality into mobile applications for photo uploads and video recording.

This module provides configuration-building operations for camera settings, including image format, source selection, orientation, and interface preferences, along with cleanup routines for managing camera resources. It works with type aliases representing options like encoding, media types, and callback handlers for success/failure events. Use cases include initializing camera parameters before capture and ensuring proper resource release in applications requiring image or video acquisition.
